raw_body: FERNANDO – LEELA (Retired teacher,​ Wesley College & Ilma International Girls’ School),​ loving daughter of late Mr & Mrs Vaithilingam Coomaraswamy,​ beloved wife of Vernon (Sri Lanka Prisons Dept.),​ precious mother of Chrysantha (UAE),​ Shirani (MD – Jobsglobal),​ Sandra (UK) & Kishan (Sri Lankan Airlines),​ loving mother-in-law of Charmaine,​ Deepal,​ Prasanna & Tushika,​ adored grandmother of Chanella & Manilal,​ Shivonne & Amrith,​ Tasha,​ Anouska,​ Kevaan,​ Viyaan & Aanya,​ cherished great-grandmother of Yaniv,​ Aavya,​ Yanuk & Alara,​ sister of late Ganesan & sister-in-law of late Jayamani,​ expired peacefully on 18th May 2024. Remains will lie at No. 2,​ 2nd Lane,​ Baddegana Road,​ Pita Kotte from 12.00 noon on Monday 20th May. Funeral service at home on 22nd May 2024 at 1.30 p.m. and thereafter for cremation at Baddegana Public Cemetery at 3.00 p.m.033898
